name: Torment (itch) (UseCondsomsKid)
description:
Tormented after a terrible accident, he keeps reliving the same dream.

How To Play:

- Health continually decreases.

- Move around and try to kill enemies, shooting enemies heals you.

- Kill all enemies to move to next stage.

- Items make you stronger.

Torment is raycaster made for the Indie Tales Game Jam in about two days.

Torment is heavily based on the olc Pixel Game Engine and the RayCastWorld extension.

For More About the engine check out One Lone Coder:
